article: Computers are more and more popular now. People can use them to do different things, but many students spend a lot of time playing computer games. The N0. 15 Middle School starts " No Game Month on February 1 st . The teacher Mrs. Green says. " During the month, we have many activities to help the students who are addicted to playing computer games. We really hope they do not play games on the computer too much. What do the students think of " No Game Month? They have different ideas about it. Linda: I don't like playing computer games and I don't know why so many boys like it. I only send emails and search the Internet on the computer. My sister often uses it to listen to music and watch movies. Peter: It's fun to play computer games. Without computer games, I don't know what to do to relax. No Game Month sounds so bad. Tony: I play computer games sometimes, but I think it's easy not to play games for a month. I can do many other interesting things, such as playing basketball and reading books.
questions: How long is " No Game Month?
Who doesn't like " No Game Month?
The N0. 15 Middle School starts " No Game Month to _ .
options: ask students to say goodbye to all kinds of games
ask students not to play computer games too much
know different ideas about playing computer games
help students use the computer to do different things
